name: Reworkd
headline: The simplest way to extract web data at scale
description:
At Reworkd, we're working on multimodal LLM agents that serve as the simplest way to extract web data at scale. Customers come to us with lists of 100s to 1000s of websites along with a data schema. Our agents traverse these websites, understand their structure, and generate code to extract data from them.

We've been working on LLM agents since their inception and have received over 30k stars on GitHub and 1M+ users across previous agent products. If you're interested in our pilot program, shoot us an email!

founders.name: Asim Shrestha, Founder
founders.description: Software engineer and open source enthusiast. Also a co-founder @ Reworkd AI

founders.name: Srijan Subedi, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder @ Reworkd AI. Combined major in Science @ UBC. Previously worked at STEMCELL Technologies

founders.name: Adam Watkins, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CTO of Reworkd AI - Pushing the boundaries of AGI agents. Deeply passionate about open-source, software architecture, engineering leadership, and emojis 
🚀😀

![Paul Graham](https://reworkd.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhome-logos-paul-graham.151d5b4c.png&w=48&q=75)
Paul Graham
Co-founder, Y Combinator
![Nat Friedman](https://reworkd.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhome-logos-nat-friedman.bf33bd7d.png&w=48&q=75)
Nat Friedman
Ex-CEO, GitHub
![Daniel Gross](https://reworkd.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhome-logos-daniel-gross.e9317e1c.png&w=48&q=75)
Daniel Gross
Co-founder, SSI
## Whats the problem? 
### Web data is difficult
Collecting, monitoring, and maintaining data can be complex, time-consuming, and costly. When you have hundreds or thousands of sites to crawl, there’s a lot to consider.
How do I handle pagination?
﻿
How do I handle infinite scroll pages?
﻿
How can I maintain extraction scripts at scale?
﻿
How do I handle dynamic content?
﻿
Why is this website not loading?
﻿
Which sites frequently change?
﻿
How can I manage retries on failures?
﻿
How do I handle rate limiting efficiently?
﻿
Which proxy server should I use?
﻿
![](https://reworkd.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhome-problem-browser.3d208c76.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://reworkd.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhome-problem-browser-modal.75ea8e70.png&w=3840&q=75)
## How can you solve it? 
### Let Reworkddo the hard work
Reworkd automates your entire web data pipeline, end-to-end. It scans websites, generates code, runs extractors, validates results, and outputs data—all from one simple system.
### Save time
Don’t waste engineering time manually writing code and building infrastructure to extract and maintain web data. Start relying on Reworkd and automate your extraction today.
### Save money
Data scraping specialists and in-house engineering teams don’t come cheap. Keep your business costs down and get Reworkd up and running.
### Save hassle
Avoid worrying about proxies, headless browsers, data consistency, silent failures, etc. Reworkd deals in web data without the difficulty.
### Futuristic features. About time.
Reworkd makes it easier than ever to extract web data at scale. Spend less time worrying about data infrastructure – and more time running your business.
Extract

generated_description:
**Reworkd: Simplifying Web Data Extraction**

Founded in 2023 and hailing from the bustling tech hub of San Francisco, Reworkd is on a mission to make web data extraction as seamless as possible. Their driving principle is straightforward: customers should be able to extract data from hundreds or thousands of websites without fuss or code. This is done through the magic of multimodal LLM agents—intelligent tools that navigate the complexities of web pages and generate the necessary code to retrieve valuable information.

With over 30,000 stars on GitHub and more than 1 million users utilizing their various agent products, Reworkd is not just another startup; it's already making waves in the generative AI and B2B space. Their approach to web data scraping sidesteps the usual headaches associated with data collection, such as handling dynamic content, maintaining extraction scripts, or dealing with rate limits. Instead, Reworkd automates everything—from scanning websites to outputting clean data—allowing teams to save both time and resources.

The team is small but mighty, consisting of just six dedicated employees, and they are backed by notable figures like Dalton Caldwell from Y Combinator, which further adds to their credibility. Being part of Y Combinator's Batch S23 not only provides them with essential resources but also places them within a vibrant community of innovators.

Reworkd is tagged as a key player in the fields of generative AI, open-source technology, and enterprise solutions. It's an attractive proposition for clients looking for a cost-effective solution to meet their data extraction needs without the burden of hiring specialized engineers.

For those interested in giving Reworkd a try, their services require no coding skills and promise minimal maintenance. They invite anyone curious to join their pilot program—definitely a low-barrier entry point for businesses seeking to streamline their data extraction processes. If this sounds like you, don’t hesitate to reach out via [their website](https://reworkd.ai).

In a world where data is more critical than ever, Reworkd presents a tantalizing solution—one that could redefine how companies approach web data extraction. They’ve got the right technology, the right backing, and a compelling vision to make data work better for everyone.
